Class Doctor

java.lang.Object
hms.User
hms.Staff
hms.Doctor
public class Doctor extends Staff
The Doctor class represents a doctor in the hospital management system. It extends the Staff class and provides functionalities specific to doctors, such as managing appointments, viewing and updating medical records, and recording appointment outcomes.

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from class hms.Staff

    age, emailAddress, gender, phoneNumber, specialization

    Fields inherited from class hms.User

  • Constructor Details

    • Doctor

      public Doctor(Scanner scanner) throws IOException
      Constructs a new Doctor instance by prompting the user for input via a Scanner. This constructor is typically used when creating a new doctor account.
      Parameters:
      scanner - The Scanner object to read user input.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs during saving the user data.

    • Doctor

      public Doctor(String id, String name, String password) throws IOException
      Constructs a new Doctor instance with the specified ID, name, and password. This constructor is typically used when loading an existing doctor account.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier for the doctor.
      name - The name of the doctor.
      password - The password for the doctor.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs during operations.
